content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what budget you have in mind for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 800 Euro per month. Do you have any suggestions for the rental price?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your budget of 800 Euro per month. Based on the 25 square meter apartment and its location in Mannheim, I would suggest a rental price of 900 Euro per month. This price would reflect the market rate for similar apartments in the area and would also allow me to maximize my gains as a landlord. Would you be interested in this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euro per month. Thank you for your help.
TERMINATE
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Very well, Baihu Li. I am glad to hear that you have agreed to the rental price of 900 Euro per month. Thank you for considering my apartment and for your business. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me. Have a pleasant day!
name: Heinrich Heine
